p: Our recent study showed that the number and relative percentages of essential oil compounds changed at variance with the geographic origin of O. decumbens populations [ 33]. A total of 18, 17, 16, and 11 compounds were identified in the populations from Nourabad Mamasani, Kahnoyeh, Behbahan, and Dehdasht, respectively [ 33]. The number of identified compounds in the investigated populations was partly in accordance with those reported in previous papers, that ranged from 8 to 35 [ 2, 7, 9, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 30, 38].
